title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Middle School Students' Creative Mathematical Problem-Solving Through Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively design three or more creative mathematics project topics with peers and instructors.
Through collaborative learning design, learners develop two or more mathematical problem-solving strategies applicable to real-world work environments.

Learners will create project deliverables in visual and interactive formats (infographics, videos, quizzes) using digital tools (Canva, Prezi, Google Slides) and pass an evaluation (survey or Q&A) confirming that at least 80% of the audience understood the core content during a 5-minute presentation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
